segments.text: I'm observing all the potential hazards in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is fully on, water gushing into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised by how quickly the sink has filled and is now overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is expanding, a real slip hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Anyone could easily lose their footing on that wet surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool the boy is standing on looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed, and it's clearly on the verge of toppling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height, especially onto a wet floor, could be serious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so focused on those cookies, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, still calmly polishing her plate, adds to the tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is right there, yet so far from noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like a meticulously set stage for several small accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope everyone comes out of this unscathed.
segments.speaker: PAR
